A parametric type design tool

Two parametric typefaces to start with

  • Prototypo Venus
    A perfect sans serif, with infinite variations.
  • Prototypo John Fell
    An Elzevir as we all like it, move it, move it.
  • And more to come!
    More styles will be added in future versions.

Fonts powered by Production Type

Upcoming features

We're hard at work, launching next fall!

  • Characters set
    Works with a basic Latin character set. Includes uppercase, lowercase, smallcaps, figures and punctuation!
  • Export fonts
    Once your design is ok, you can export all font format you need to use your fonts offline & online.
  • Split views
    Improve your design process with severals views: glyph, words, paragraphs, and watch changes in real time.
  • Font manager
    Create and manage multiple projects! Define variants of a master typeface, or branch it in sub-projects!
  • Switch alternates
    A lot of glyphs are proposed with one or more alternates to define the perfect shape to fit your custom design.
  • …and more!
    We work on more advanced great features, like spacing/kerning, individualize parameters, and more!

They talk about us!

Thank you for subscribing : )
